volunteer_experience.info:
Core Organising Team Member (Aug '18 - Apr '19)• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.46 lakhs through corporate deals & alumni contribution.• Organized the 60th edition of Spring Fest and was a part of a 33 member team, which saw 30000+ footfall from all over India.• Coordinated sponsorship drive in Bangalore and Kolkata raising INR 10 lakhs and a record highest sponsorship from Bangalore.• Co-ordinated a team of 37 associate members, increasing overall in-house…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Core Organising Team Member (Aug '18 - Apr '19)• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.46 lakhs through corporate deals & alumni contribution.• Organized the 60th edition of Spring Fest and was a part of a 33 member team, which saw 30000+ footfall from all over India.• Coordinated sponsorship drive in Bangalore and Kolkata raising INR 10 lakhs and a record highest sponsorship from Bangalore.• Co-ordinated a team of 37 associate members, increasing overall in-house participation by 15%.• Successfully organized the first-ever Social Conclave SAKSHAM-TRANScending the taboo spreading transgender awareness.• Conducted the preliminary round of wildfire (rock band competition) in Guwahati and Kolkata.• Co-headed 2 associate members and 5 crew members, to manage 3 guest house and look after more than 300 guests.Associate Team Member (Aug '17 - Apr '18)• Publicized the fest extensively in West Bengal increasing participation by 30% & the highest ever participation from the region.• Coordinated a team of 30 Campus Ambassador and published 12 media articles in renowned newspapers.• Responsible for conducting the flagship events, Wildfire and Sargam at the Tagore Open Air Theatre that witnessed 200+ participants.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Spring Fest
volunteer_experience.title: Core Organising Team Member

projects: [{"title":"User Rating Prediction based on Review Texts","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"• Web-scrapped around 3.6 lakhs hotel reviews from TripAdvisor website using Selenium & BeautifulSoup python libraries.• Pre-processed the dataset by removing stop words, punctuations & lemmatizing and converted my text into vectors using the TF-IDF method.• Classified user ratings based on reviews using the KNN method and Naïve Bayes Classifiers & was able to achieve a max accuracy of 80.14%."},{"title":"Chi-square Analysis to examine correlation between two attributes","start_date":"Nov 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"• Examined the correlation using chi-square analysis & tested the hypothesis 'Action games are highly rated among teens'• Developed a python code for calculating Pearson's chi-squared correlation coefficient without using any specified libraries.• Performed the hypothesis testing using a 95% confidence level and found that the given variables were highly correlated."},{"title":"Face Recognition based attendance marking system","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":"• Built face recognition software that facilitates the online completion of attendance of a class by just one capture of the class.• Used images captured by smartphones to train the model which were further augmented into multiple images for identification.• Applied Convolutional Neural Network model for identifying faces of the students present in the photograph to mark their attendance."}]
